## Description {#details}

A setup object containing callbacks to construct a memory manager and memory access object.

Both are optional. If not specified, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/epcgenericjitlinkmemorymanager">EPCGenericJITLinkMemoryManager</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/epcgenericmemoryaccess">EPCGenericMemoryAccess</a> will be used.

Definition at line 38 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/simpleremoteepc-h">SimpleRemoteEPC.h</a>.
